record.title: RECOGNIZING THE AFRICAN-AMERICAN SPIRITUAL

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 30, S. Res. 69.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed at the appropriate place in the Record as if read, without intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
